episodes.title: Husband: You're In A Cult!
episodes.description:
Genevieve had her universe shatter 28 days before filming this interview when she was forced to confront her beliefs after her husband told her she is in a cult. She was born and raised [4th generation on both sides] in meetings. She has lived and gone to meetings in 5 counties around the world!  

You can Contact Genevieve at: genevieve.newell@gmail.com
You can contact David/Merissa at: nontypicaltravelers@gmail.com

I David, the interviewer, and Genevieve, grew up in a legalistic group started in 1897 that denies the deity of Christ and strives in vain towards a work based salvation.  They claim no name, but are known as Meetings, The Truth, Friends & Workers, 2x2s, The Fellowship, The Way, etc.  They claim to be a continuation of the 1st century church and the "ministers" or workers, are homeless and go in pairs.  However, they stay in members homes known as the Friends.   In '23 & '24 a lot of CSA and SA has been revealed in the leadership and members, so many of the Friends are leaving the group. You can find out more about them here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_by_Twos

episodes.title: Why Cults HAVE to Shun Their Ex-Members
Investigation of the 2x2 Sect's "Early Days" with Author & Historian Cherie Kropp-Ehrig
episodes.description:
Want to support this channel? https://www.buymeacoffee.com/davidalink

To Contact Cherie: Use “contact us” button on her websites.

Cherie’s Book, published May 2022:
Preserving the Truth: The Church without a Name and Its Founder, William Irvine
Available on: https://amzn.to/40J2V2y
Amazon reviews appreciated.

Cherie’s Websites:
Expressions by Ex-2x2s (aka EXP): https://ex2x2.info
Telling The Truth (TTT) https://TellingTheTruth.info
Author website: https://cheriekroppehrig.com

Other Resources:
Journal of John Long https://tellingthetruth.info/publications_johnlong/
The Early Days by Goodhand Pattison https://tellingthetruth.info/publications_index/pattisong.php
What is Grace through Faith? https://ex2x2.info/2020/11/09/what-is-by-grace-through-faith/
Does God Have Only One Right Way? https://ex2x2.info/2020/11/14/gods-only-right-true-church/
Is It Wrong to Question? https://ex2x2.info/2020/11/12/is-it-wrong-to-question/
Why You SHOULD Ask Questions: https://ex2x2.info/2020/11/12/why-you-should-ask-questions/
Are You Sure of Your Salvation? https://ex2x2.info/2020/11/09/assurance-of-salvation/
Bible Study Fellowship (BSF) https://www.bsfinternational.org/

There are two kinds of people:
One to whom belief is more precious than truth, and
the other to whom truth is more precious than belief.
(Author Unknown)

How to prove for yourself that the 2x2 Church and Ministry did NOT exist prior to the
20th century.
Simply search and find some of the following items predating 1897:
- A hymn written by a Friend or Worker
- A 2x2 hymnbook
- A photograph or name of a Worker or Friend
- A letter written by a Friend or Worker
- A 2x2 Convention announcement or speakers list
- A 2x2 Workers List
- Notes from any 2x2 gathering/assembly.
- A group that met in homes and with pairs of itinerant ministers

And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free” (John 8:32)


Tags; William Irvine, John Long, George Walker, William Gill, Jack Carroll, Edward Cooney, Willie Hughes, Adam Hutchison, Friends and Workers, Meetings, FBI Investigation, the truth, the way, the fellowship, Dean Bruer,

Want to support this channel? https://www.buymeacoffee.com/davidalink

Laura grew up in the LDS (Mormon) Church until she married into the 2x2s (friends and workers) religion.  She and her husband Todd share their deliverance story of God delivering them into Christ alone! 

I David, the interviewer,  and Todd, grew up in a legalistic group started in 1897 that denies the deity of Christ and strives in vain towards a work based salvation.
